subject: Flock Safety Reponse to RFI 20252027 License Plate Recognition Systems
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Detective DeWitt,

Thank you for the opportunity to respond to the RFI regarding License Plate Recognition. Flock Safety has completed the RFI, and our response is attached to this email in PDF format. 

We appreciate the opportunity.

Please let me know if you have any questions. 
	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/d13de8ef-1171-45ae-9378--com 	 
Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager
